PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-11182016-12-09NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-002-GC-125 - NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-002-GC-125 to NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD (NGTL) in order to stimulate development in the North Montney natural gas basin and support the Canadian natural gas market by offering a transportation link to the liquefied natural gas (LNG) industry in Canada, and enhance Canada's economic prosperity.
AttachmentsAttachment
